titleStmt.title: The Quakers yearly metting [sic] or convocation impeached on the behalf of the Commons of England by Francis Bugg.
titleStmt.author: Bugg, Francis, 1640-1724?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold by John Guillam,
